nodes.bodyText:
please change the example URL too:
https://mystudiesdeployment.com/hydra
Your application are not considering "oauth2" as part of the base URL, if you need the value to be included, it might make sense to rename it to something else, e.g. auth_url_hydra_server, to keep the naming consistent.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -1,21 +1,21 @@
 # API_KEY is <android.bundleid>:<android.apptoken>
-# These values should match the ones set in study metadata server.
-# see: WCP-WS/src/main/resources/authorizationResource.properties
+# These values should match the ones set in study datastore server.
+# see: study-datastore/src/main/resources/authorizationResource.properties
 API_KEY=""
 
-# URL of study metadata server.
-# e.g. https://mystudiesdeployment.com/StudyMetaData
-BASE_URL_WCP_SERVER=""
+# URL of study datastore server.
+# e.g. https://mystudiesdeployment.com/study-datastore
+BASE_URL_STUDY_DATASTORE_SERVER=""
 
 # URL of different service bundles within participant datastore.
-# e.g. https://mystudiesdeployment.com/myStudiesUserMgmtWS
-BASE_URL_REGISTRATION_SERVER=""
-# e.g. https://mystudiesdeployment.com/myStudiesConsentMgmtWS
-BASE_URL_REGISTRATION_CONSENT_SERVER=""
-# e.g. https://mystudiesdeployment.com/myStudiesEnrollmentMgmt
-BASE_URL_REGISTRATION_ENROLLMENT_SERVER=""
-
-# URL of AuthServer.
+# e.g. https://mystudiesdeployment.com/participant-user-datastore
+BASE_URL_PARTICIPANT_DATASTORE_SERVER=""
+# e.g. https://mystudiesdeployment.com/participant-consent-datastore
+BASE_URL_PARTICIPANT_DATASTORE_CONSENT_SERVER=""
+# e.g. https://mystudiesdeployment.com/participant-enroll-datastore
+BASE_URL_PARTICIPANT_DATASTORE_ENROLLMENT_SERVER=""
+
+# URL of Hydra Server.
 # e.g. https://mystudiesdeployment.com/oauth2

+# e.g. https://mystudiesdeployment.com/participant-consent-datastore

 # e.g. https://mystudiesdeployment.com/oauth2

nodes.bodyText:
nit: remove server from the names; datastore is supposed to replace the term "server"
also change this one to "participant_consent_datastore" instead, to be consistent with other names.
